reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars He loves it
reviews.reviewText: My son is almost 5 years old and he plays with this daily. I love that there is a guide book inside to show you what you could possibly build. This helps your child with being creative. It’s a must buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my classroom kiddos. It is a creative way for them to create a variety of items.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun, creative toy.
reviews.reviewText: Fun toy, allows little minds to be creative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great colors, love them
reviews.reviewText: ease for children, they really enjoy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice addition to Duplos
reviews.reviewText: These are a fun little toy. I love that they are compatible with Lego Duplos, however my kids did not love them. They didn't dislike them. They play with them when I bring them out, but they never ask for them specifically. That being said, they are a nice addition to Duplos, and they do encourage creative play. My 2 year olds love when I make numbers, letters, or shapes out of them and identifying them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this product and it's great for kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable, fun, all around great toy
reviews.reviewText: This was an amazing gift for my kids. They love building with them and can make all kinds of awesome things. My kids are pretty rough too, and so far we've only had a single broken piece since Christmas, and even that piece didn't break all the way, only cracked a little. They are also compatible with most brands of those big lego-style blocks! That's pretty convenient.The only two things I'd mention:1) the pieces are pretty small, so a potential choking hazard if you have kids who put stuff in their mouths.2) If you have two kids or more, consider buying two sets! More complex builds obviously require more pieces, and the pieces can get used up fast between multiple kids. Two sets will cut the bickering over pieces in half.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Creative building set
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a gift for my 7 year old grandson. He started putting the parts together immediately after opening the gift. The pieces allow for creativity, or there are suggestions for specific designs if the child wants to build something with directions. The adults in the room were very interested in the building process, as well.

The kids just love it. The best thing is it's compatibility with Lego Duplo tiles so you are just limited only by your imagination on what you can built. The toy is suitable for kids and adults too. Found myself building with kids.
Nos agrado mucho el producto, ya que mis niñas se la pasan creando nuevos diseños con los bloques de tubería. Muy didáctico y divertido, los tubos tienen muy buen material.
Lo regale a un niño de 4 años y de verdad que los entretiene y ayuda a desarrollar su creatividad.
